title: The Life of the Queen Mother
brief_description: The life of H.M. the Queen Mother from her marriage to 1961. Her early overseas tours and crowded public life, her accession as Queen, her private role as mother, her activities during World War II; the weddings of her daughters; her wide field of public service.
